scripts.pug:build: ortfomk build src/ with database/database.json to dist/ --write-progress progress.json
scripts.stylus:build: concurrently 'stylus --compress --sourcemap src/style.styl src/style.styl -o assets/style.css' 'stylus --compress --sourcemap-base src/ src/page-styles/ -o assets/page-styles/'
scripts.assets:build: cp -r assets/* dist/ && svgo --recursive --quiet -f assets/ -o dist/
scripts.build: pnpm database:build && concurrently npm:pug:build npm:livescript:build npm:stylus:build npm:assets:build
scripts.pug:watch: ENV=dev ortfomk develop src/ with database/database.json to dist/
scripts.stylus:watch: concurrently 'stylus --watch --compress --sourcemap src/style.styl src/style.styl -o assets/style.css' 'stylus --watch --compress --sourcemap-base src/ src/page-styles/ -o assets/page-styles/'
